# Node.js
node_modules/

# Build files
build/
dist/

# Dependency directories
client/node_modules/
server/node_modules/

# Environment variables
.env

# Editor-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Log files
*.log

# Compiled binary files
*.o
*.out
*.exe

# Ignore local npm package directories
*.npm

# Ignore yarn-error.log files
yarn-error.log
